body.name: Knife Set, 21 Pieces Kitchen Knife Set with Block, Built-in Knife Sharpener, German Stainless Steel Knife Block Set, Dishwasher Safe, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Sharp, Non-Stick & Rust-Resistant】Black kitchen knife set uses a unique anti-rust, anti-stick and anti-oxidant Teflon coating, so that the blade is always in the best condition, extremely easy to clean, greatly extending the life of the knife.

【Dishwasher Safe】This knife sets for kitchen with block is dishwasher safe, easy to maintain. Perfect for storage after washing and drying. The whole body of the knives set for kitchen is made of premium stainless steel material. The surface layer has a high-grade anti-rust coating, which will not rust as easily as other kitchen knife sets, and will not cause damage despite the high intensity impact of the dishwasher.

【All in One Knife Set】21 pieces knife set includes: 8" Chef knife, 8" Slicing knife, 7" Santoku knife, 8" Serrated bread knife, 6" Boning knife, 5" Cheese knife, 3" Peeling Knife, 5" Utility knife, 3.5" Paring knife, 8 Pcs 4.5" Serrated Steak Knife, 1 Pc Poultry Shears, 1 Pc Kitchen Shear, and Black hard wood Knife Block with built-in Knife Sharpener.

【Comfortable and Non-slip Handle】The knife handle material is made of German high carbon stainless steel.Designed by the most professional designers to meet the ergonomic handle, so that the knife is very comfortable to use, even for a long time, the hand will not feel any discomfort. To improve the safety of using the knife, we have also designed extra anti-slip air holes for the handle to ensure safety when making delicious food.
【Lifetime Warranty】Each knife set are backed by excellent quality and undergo strict quality inspection, we provide a lifetime warranty for every customer, please feel free to purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Astercook One-Piece 21 Pieces All-Metal Knife Set (Elegant Black)

8" Chef knife The chef's knife is the most commonly used knife in the kitchen for cutting, slicing, dicing and other cutting activities. 7" Santoku Knife The ridges on the blades are specially designed to prevent foods from sticking while you slice, making them perfect for chopping and dicing vegetables. 8" Bread Knife The bread knife has a serrated blade that effortlessly slices through bread, baguettes and other ingredients easily. 8" Slicing Knife Perfectly engineered slicing knife tapered to a razor-sharp edge for effortless carving and slicing of roast, beef, pork, poultry as well other larger fruits and vegetables.

6 Pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife The 6 Pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife work well for slicing and carving meat, cheese, butter, bread, baguette, turkey, pizza, ham, brisket, fish, vegetables, fruit, and especially beef and steak. 5" Utility Knife The 5" utility knife is specially designed to cut, carve all types of fruits and vegetables and effortlessly remove fat or tendons from meat 3.5" Paring Knife The paring knife has a smaller blade that helps make precise cuts with ease and enhances fine work in the kitchen. Precision slicing, chopping and peeling - everything is a breeze. Shears and Knife Block with Built in Sharpener No need to worry about the knife becoming not sharp enough, high quality Built in Knife Sharpener to keep the knife in the best condition all the time.
Featured Knives Show Previous page Next page Special Features

Dishwasher Safe This knife sets for kitchen with block is dishwasher safe, easy to maintain. Perfect for storage after washing and drying. The whole body of the knives set for kitchen is made of premium stainless steel material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price and quality, couldn't ask for much more.
reviews.reviewText: These have held up well, been using them about a month and they're still shaving sharp. Would highly suggest the usual, no dishwashers and an edge keeper, but these have held a razors edge so far. Pretty comfortable in the hand, not terribly heavy (in a good way) but still a solid all metal knife. They do look nice too which is a pleasant bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set, looks "sharp"
reviews.reviewText: This was a great value as I was furnishing my new home. I like the black color as it looks sleek and modern to me. Great set for everything that I would need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Design and very Sharp
reviews.reviewText: This Knife Set works Great for our household. Extremely Sharp and well balanced. Block holder is very nice! and well made. There have been complaints that knives show rust if you clean them in dishwasher so we decided to hand wash and dry them by hand. Only takes a few minutes and have never seen any signs of rust or defects on knives. Knives hold their sharp edge extremely well and have not used the Sharpener yet! I'am sure the sharpener will do its job if needed. If you are looking for everyday Great knife Set at a Lower price try this set. The wife likes the lightness and sharpness of these knifes and the looks are outstanding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knives at a great price
reviews.reviewText: These are solid knives good weight and they cut like butter! I am very impressed with the quality at the price point. I would definitely had wash just because I think it’s important to take care quality items if you want them to last. I have had far more expensive knife sets that didn’t cut or feel as good in the hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are super sharp and nice to look at....the only downside i had is they tend to rust easily the first night I had used them and left it in the sink a couple of water droplets dried out on it and rust started to form i did remove it though so I suggest when you are done using them hand wash and hand dry immediately and put them back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp and great looking
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this beautiful set of black knives after reviewing several options. Theses knives are very eloquent and really sharp.These may be the best set of knives I’ve ever purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sharp, nice looking knives
reviews.reviewText: I really like these because the handle and blade are seamless which makes them easy to clean. They are incredibly sharp...just cut myself tonight haha! The handle is a little lightweight and slippery which makes them easy to flip over upside down or drop. But they are pretty great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and good quality
reviews.reviewText: These are a game changer. We were looking to replace our knife set. This set is both affordable and appears to be good quality. They are extremely sharp and makes preparing meals a lot easier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Disappointed in the finishing of the product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Yes the knives can cut, no they don’t stay sharp and the black finish is chipping off. Hand wash only and still have issues.
Can highly recommend these knives. I really like the design and the storage block. They are very sharp and nice to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: No Guard, super dangerous to hold
reviews.reviewText: Those knife are absolutely not ergonomic, except from 1, all of them have no guard if your hand slips on the all metal handle, you will cut yourself badly, nothing to stop your hand before the blade.The block isn't black at all, it's a pinkish brown, dosent match the knifes nor my kitchen.
